Indian Economy.title: Modi Mumbai Visit Live Updates: PM to address conclave, chair forum at India Maritime Week 2025 today
Indian Economy.summary: PM Narendra Modi in Mumbai Today, India Maritime Week 2025 Live Updates: Union Home Minister Amit Shah had inaugurated the India Maritime Week – 2025 on Monday.

Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | It’s not easy for the Fed to set monetary policy with a data blindfold
Indian Economy.summary: With Washington in shutdown and key economic statistics missing, the US Federal Reserve has had to operate in near darkness. How well its October rate call works out, though, could be a matter of suspense for months.

Indian Economy.title: RBI’s nod for bank-funded M&As comes at a great moment for the Indian economy
Indian Economy.summary: Indian banks have long had the wherewithal to fund big-ticket acquisitions. RBI’s regulatory easing of the way should lend corporate India dynamism at a moment that’s apt for a wave of mergers and even help reduce our foreign debt.

Stock Market.title: Sensex gains nearly 400 points as metals, infra stocks drive mid-session rally
Stock Market.summary: Market breadth remained positive on the BSE with 2,390 stocks advancing against 1,610 declining, while 172 remained unchanged

Stock Market.title: Sensex, Nifty open higher on strong FII inflows; Metal stocks lead gains
Stock Market.summary: The benchmark indices opened in positive territory on Wednesday with the BSE Sensex rising 58.96 points or 0.07 per cent to 84,687.12 at 9.50 am, while the NSE Nifty gained 34.15 points or 0.13 per cent to 25,970.35.

Stock Market.summary: Benchmark indices traded near day’s high. NTPC, Adani Enterprises, JSW Steel, Adani Ports lead gainers, while L&T, M&M and Bajaj twins drag the most.

Startups & Funding.title: Govt to channel Startup Fund of Funds towards deep-tech ventures: Piyush Goyal
Startups & Funding.summary: Commerce minister Piyush Goyal said that nearly all of the upcoming Startup Fund of Funds will be devoted to Deep Tech, as India seeks to shift from a back-office economy to a global innovation powerhouse.

Startups & Funding.title: Sky-high gold prices, BlueStone IPO light a spark in India’s demi-fine jewellery market
Startups & Funding.summary: Consumers are increasingly seeing gold as just an investment and splurging on mid-tier jewellery instead, prompting venture capitalists to swoop in on the nascent segment.

Startups & Funding.title: Coin by Zerodha to offer fixed deposits soon; Rainmatter to invest in Blostem: Report
Startups & Funding.summary: Zerodha is launching a fixed deposit product on its Coin platform, enhancing its range of low-risk investment options.

Startups & Funding.title: Canada’s CPP Investments eyes bigger India play after tripling portfolio
Startups & Funding.summary: The Canadian pension giant—which has NSE, Kotak Mahindra Bank, and Flipkart in its fast-growing India portfolio—plans to keep expanding its exposure to the country.

Startups & Funding.title: Why founders are rethinking the IPO
Startups & Funding.summary: Public founders face increased regulatory burden and are often forced to prioritise quarterly results over radical innovation

Banking & Finance.title: Rs 750 crore RCom loan: Anil Ambani withdraws plea for interim relief against IDBI Bank hearing
Banking & Finance.summary: Anil Ambani had sought a direction from the Bombay High Court to restrain IDBI Bank from holding a personal hearing until he was provided with all the relevant material and given a fair opportunity to respond.

Banking & Finance.title: Advances of small finance banks expected to cross ₹2 L crore this fiscal: Report
Banking & Finance.summary: The report said diversification is crucial as the RBI guidelines mandate thresholds of 3 per cent and 1 per cent for gross and net non-performing assets (NPAs), respectively, for the SFB to seek a universal banking license

Banking & Finance.title: TVS Credit Services reports 27% growth in net profit for Q2FY26 on higher disbursements
Banking & Finance.summary: Non-banking financial services company TVS Credit Services reported net profit of Rs 204 Crore for quarter ended September 2025, a 27% growth compared to Q2FY25.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI issues draft guidelines to aid faster cross-border inward payments
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI proposes draft guidelines for quicker cross-border payments, inviting public feedback by November 19, effective in six months.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI proposes steps to speed up cross-border payment inflows
Banking & Finance.summary: To further speed up the process, the regulator proposed that banks could introduce a "straight through" process with automated systems to credit payments directly to individual accounts after assessing the risks

Technology Sector.title: Aditya-L1 Mission: First set of complete Solar Ultraviolet Imaging Telescope data released
Technology Sector.summary: Aditya-L1, launched by the Indian Space Research Organisation on September 2, 2023, carries seven instruments to study the Sun across a wide spectral window ranging from hard X-rays to infrared.
